TopicTitle: [WIP][0.1] Red vs Blue!A BDArmory expansion pack... now with 100% more stealth!

Articles.Content:
Red vs Blue is an expansion to [BahamutoD's BDArmory](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209) inspired by RED FLAG and TOPGUN programmes, where dissimilar aircraft battle each other in aggressor/defender scenarios. Neither Red nor Blue represent specific sovereign actors, but are abstracted by whatever ideas tickle my fancy.

![votj3iV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/votj3iV.jpg)

Since people have been bugging me to release the parts I have done so far, I am putting out RvB version 0.0.0.1/2... because people apparently just have to have their pylons!

More gratuitous pictures:

![OmGfO5O.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OmGfO5O.jpg)

![ZPYo2xX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ZPYo2xX.jpg)

COMING SOON: An album of all the new parts (once I get the time).

**CURRENT VERSION:**

0.1.0

**DOWNLOAD:**

[**Kerbalstuff.com**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1077/Red%20versus%20Blue%21%20A%20BDArmory%20expansion%20pack)

**HOW TO INSTALL:**

Drag the **KerbalDynamics** folder into your **gamedata** folder. If an older version of RvB exists, delete it first before installing the latest version. RvB requires the latest version of [BDArmory](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209) to be installed to function.

**VERSION HISTORY:**

    0.1.0[LIST][*]Added K4A missile[*]Added K4E missile[*]Added K4G missile[*]Added K26 missile[*]Added K60 missile[*]Added K77 missile[*]Added K132 missile[*]Added KKe-25-5 low observable cannon[*]Added 25x137mm low observable magazine[*]Added Low observable weapons bay, Small[*]Added Low observable weapons bay, Large[*]Added Low observable nose cone[*]Added AN/APG-77 inline radar[*]Added Auxiliary Power Unit[*]Added Large TER/Fuel Tank combo[*]Added Small Missile Rail[*]Added Dual Missile Rack[*]Also added BRU-61/A rack to Blue... just because![*]All components are listed under BDA category; they are still double-listed due to debugging issues - once those are sorted out they'll be BDA exclusives until RvB gets its own categories set up[/LIST]0.0.0.1/2[LIST][*]Preview featuring pylons, ejector racks and missile launchers[/LIST]

**LICENSE:**

This pack is distributed under the license [CC-BY-SA 4.0.](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)

**WARNING!**

**Both BDArmory and RvB are works in progress. As such they may not function properly due to mod conflicts or bugs. As RvB is only a parts expansion, and out of consideration of BahamutoD, non-RvB part related issues should be reported on his** [**BDArmory**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209) **thread. RvB part or balance issues should be reported here.**

**Thank you for your consideration.**
